column4: is there something i need to ajust in my ubuntu network settings?
i got slow newtorking spees when i installed ubuntu 9.10, and i'm not familliar with linux at all, when i copy over a file to my desktop from my smb share on my other windwos system i get about 3MB/s
but if i leave ubuntu and boot with windows then i get 11MB/s from system to system
Please don't flood, use http://paste.ubuntu.com to paste, don't use Enter as punctuation.
